Getting Started with Blogging in Markdown

Posted on December 25, 2025 5 min read

This template showcases a clean, responsive design. Use YAML front matter for SEO-friendly metadata like titles and dates. Add images with ![alt text](image.jpg) and code blocks for Python/PyTorch snippets.

“Markdown keeps things simple and portable across platforms.” [web:28]

About Me

Machine learning researcher at DLR in Jena, Germany. Focused on anomaly detection, XAI, and deep learning with PyTorch. Follow for technical deep dives and occasional novel recommendations.
